overview: Welcome to the Nordics' cheekiest sex fair. Anything can happen - and it does, when the sex-crazed crowd turns on all the delicious strips and horny porn girls. We get to follow Puma Swede as she visits her old homeland to be a crowd pleaser at the erotica fair, as well as meeting her loose girlfriends and some newcomers who want to become porn models. And Puma is the wildest of them all. On site are Mike Beck and his right-hand man Erik Fischer, to document all the beauty.
tagline: A sex-crazy girl, a wild porn fair full of horny guys... what could possibly happen!
title: Sexmässan
